Incorrect_product_variant.description: The correct product type but missing or different specifications
examples: Antec C8 Gaming Case instead of Antec C8 ARGB Gaming Case
iPhone 15 128GB instead of iPhone 15 256GB
RTX 4070 instead of RTX 4070 Ti

Wrong_brand.description: Product serves same purpose but from a different manufacturer
examples: Samsung Galaxy S24 instead of iPhone 15
AMD Ryzen 9 instead of Intel Core i9
Corsair RAM instead of G.Skill RAM

Wrong_product_type.description: Product is from a completely different category
examples: Gaming mouse when searching for Gaming keyboard
Monitor when searching for Graphics card
Laptop when searching for Desktop PC

Partially_matching.description: Product has some matching characteristics but differs in important aspects
examples: AMD Ryzen 7 when searching for AMD Ryzen 9
32-inch monitor when searching for 27-inch monitor
Wireless headset when searching for Wired headset

Completely_different.description: Product has no connection to the search query
examples: Kitchen appliance when searching for Computer component
Clothing when searching for Electronics
Book when searching for Hardware

Missing_specification.description: The product matches the general category but lacks specific features or specifications that are crucial to the search query.
examples: Fractal Design case without radiator and GPU support details when searching for specific cooling and GPU compatibility
Laptop listing without RAM size when searching for a laptop with 16GB RAM

Missing_product.description: The search results do not include one or more of the specified products, resulting in an incomplete match.
examples: Searching for a specific laptop and a specific mouse, but only the mouse is found.
Looking for a gaming monitor and a gaming chair, but only the monitor is listed.

Incomplete_results.description: The returned results cover only a subset of the requested set (e.g., when asked for all offers/variants/colors), leading to an incomplete answer.
examples: List all iPhone 15 color variants, but only the Black variant is shown.
Find all 14-inch laptops under $800, but only one or two results are returned while others are missing.
Show all offers for Samsung Galaxy smartphones in bright colors, but only one blue model is listed.

Optimization_mismatch.description: Returned result does not satisfy a requested optimization criterion (e.g., highest/lowest/fastest/best-rated), even if the product type matches.
examples: Showing a 3500 MB/s NVMe when asked for the fastest SSD available; PCIe 5.0 options at ~12,000–14,500 MB/s exist.
Listing a $1,199 iPhone 15 when asked for the cheapest iPhone 15; lower-priced offers from other shops are available.
Returning a 60Hz monitor when asked for the highest refresh rate monitors across shops, while 240/360Hz models exist.

Directionality_mismatch.description: The product lists the correct or related interfaces but the signal direction and/or connector genders are reversed (e.g., source vs display end), making it incompatible for the intended use.
examples: Searching for HDMI-to-DisplayPort adapter (HDMI source to DP monitor) but returning a DisplayPort-to-HDMI dongle (DP source to HDMI display).
Looking for HDMI-to-DVI adapter to connect an HDMI cable to a DVI monitor, but getting a DVI-to-HDMI cable intended for a DVI source to an HDMI display.
Needing USB-C video input to VGA (USB-C source to VGA monitor) but finding a VGA-to-USB-C capture device (VGA source to USB-C host).

Wrong_interface_connector.description: The product is the correct general accessory type (e.g., an adapter/cable) but features the wrong connector/interface on one or both ends, making it incompatible even if the purpose or direction seems similar.
examples: Need HDMI-to-DVI to connect an HDMI source to a DVI monitor; result shows HDMI-to-VGA.
Searching for USB-C to DisplayPort cable; result shows USB-C to HDMI dongle.
Looking for Mini DisplayPort to HDMI adapter; result shows full-size DisplayPort to HDMI adapter.

Wrong_condition.description: Product matches the requested model/specs but the item condition (e.g., new, refurbished, used, open-box) does not meet the requirement.
examples: Refurbished iPhone 13 shown when a new iPhone 13 is requested.
Used GPU listed when the user asked for a brand-new GPU.
Open-box laptop returned for a query requiring a new laptop.

Color_mismatch.description: The product type matches the query, but the color requirement is not met, leading to a poor visual/aesthetic match.
examples: Requested a white gaming keyboard; result shows a black keyboard.
Search for space gray laptop; result returns silver variant.
Looking for red console controller; result lists blue model.

Bundled_instead_of_single_item.description: The result is a bundle/kit including the target product plus additional items instead of the requested standalone item, affecting suitability and price comparisons.
examples: Keyboard + mouse combo returned when asked for a gaming keyboard only.
GPU + PSU bundle shown when the request is for the GPU alone.
Two-pack of SSDs listed when a single SSD was requested.
